item.description:
Hope you all had a wonderful Thanksgiving!

So, it looks like we will do the Minuteman Historic National Park again this Thanksgiving weekend.
What’s nice about this walk is that it’s very local and has an even terrain for all to enjoy.

Meet at Lexington Rd. Meriam’s Corner parking area, which marks the entrance to the Minute Man National Historical Park. Lexington Rd. connects downtown Concord to Rt. 2A.
Landmarks on Lexington Rd. include Louisa May Alcott's Orchard House and the Hawthorne Inn.

For a park map use this link -
http://www.nps.gov/mi...
item.name: Walk at Minuteman Historic National Park
